resources.string: Keep calm greenhorn! I\'m waiting for your position. Otherwise you can tell me your position by using the search.
Could not determine your current location. Please use the search to set you current location.
Your device does not support the required encoding. Therefore this app can not be used.
Are you connected with the internet? Click herer to retry.
Oops!\nAn error has occurred. Click here to retry.
Sorry this app needs a acceleration sensor, but your device has none. The app can not be used without this sensor.
